name: woo-wise-transfer-unofficial
description: Unofficial WooCommerce payment gateway for Wise Transfer

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/checkout.min.css assets/css/checkout.css && cleancss -o assets/css/admin.min.css assets/css/admin.css
scripts.minify:js: terser assets/js/checkout.js -o assets/js/checkout.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/copy-button.js -o assets/js/copy-button.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: pnpm version:sync && pnpm minify && pnpm zip
